ðŸ‘€ What is an action button?

The action button is a fixed button that can sit in the bottom left or right of the page. Here we have it on the bottom right. They are great for providing a prominent link to support or if you just want to call out a special feature of your site.

Here is why our action button is pretty awesome.

  • It is free! Can't beat that, right?
  • Supports icons, images, and even video!
  • Has an option for text as well as the icon.
  • Supports background and size so you can customize it to make it your own.
